values:
=============================================================================

If you read this, even if I don't speak to you often, please post a memory of me. It can be anything you want, it can be good or bad, just so long as it happened.

Then post this to your journal to see what people remember about you. 
============================================================================= 


Please do this i would like to see everyones response bad or good...

====================================================================================

And i guess i'll update... well me and mark are LONG over.. hah guess i saw that coming . i'm losing weight... which is great =) haha and im not as stressed out this week as i usually am . This weekend better be fun... girls, we are getting drunk no matter what! well nothing else to say.. haha its short but atleast i updated!

its lunch time and i just finished my fucking essay... finally...god.. its not even as long as its supposed to be... how do i write 2 - 4 pages on multiculturalism? i dont know...i never ever have anythign to say when i write in here...me and mark go out now :)  thats about all the news in my life! this weekend is gonig to be amazing... 4 nights to get drunk.. it better be good...! hahaha nothign else to say.... i suck at this journal thing now. i have to start writing in it more...! have a good day! xoxo

Lastnight was the best night of my entire life.... i swear i had the most fun i have had in forever!but nicole is gone now :( i said my goodbyes lastnight and when i left i cried soo much... like i couldnt stop.. then i drove around until i got over it then i went home and atempted an all nighter... but by 2  i "rested my eyes" hahah then i fell asleep...this morning i called nicole when i got to school to say bye again and i started to cry so i went home... i was wayyy too tire and waayy to upset to stay.... the bells going to ring in 3 seconds! have a nice day! xoxo

HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA
im loaded and for once im not crying .... yay for me .. maybe i can drink normally again! hahah and also i found out shit tonight that made me piss my clothes laughing... haha wont say what it is but i just keep finding things out day by day and u think it would just keep getting more and more upseting but i find it sooooooo funny now... haha sue me?? i cracks... i deleted every entry i made since i got home... i was drunk during every one i have written since i have been back in town.... so its even funnier.... haha take me seriously i dare you...hahahahahahahahaha!!!! i had a laugh tonight.... so its all good... and last night i think was the best night of my entire life.... it was so funny... i love the fact that my friends can make me forget any problem i have ....Thanx :) oh my i must be off to bed!! just one more laugh in your face ha ha ha ha ha.......... HA!!

ps: why are u reading my journal anyways?

So i forgot one detail of lastnight.... me and nicole veitch were trying to beat eachother up! hahaha we were slapping eachother and shit and someone had to come over and break us up! it was hilarious! i just got up like a half an hour ago.. i was very hungover this morning.. like throwing up and stuf... it sucked a lot... so i never went to work... and today im gongi to pick up some grocerys..if i can afford it...i owe so much money!yikes ashleys making weird noises with her computer hhhahaha well im going now! have a nice day xoxo

my spuervisor is gone mad....like she lost it at us... im scared haha and very drunk.....ahhhhh :*( mommies getting a call.. uh oh im scared.. hahahahahaha yah right....HAHAHAHAHA i have noything else to say.... ony im going to be home lin like 3 dyas!!! goodnight... i cant type:(*

oh my god.. messed up night.... holy fuck i cant even believe the shit that went down... hahah 
this guy is a total and complete idiot... i would like to know how the fuck he can think hes getting away with all of this? he has fucking tried to get with all of us now and only one has fell for it and hes being a jackass about it. idiot... i hate guys some lot...well the stupid ones anyway! haha whatever... im never gonig to see him again and hopefully she wont either.. i feel so bad... oh my.. well im out now.. gonig to make some rice!! have a nice day...
today is friday the 13th!!! just remembered...hahahahha yah im a fag...

Holy shit... this is my last weekend in st johns.... I cant get over it! this time next week ill be packing my bags and doing some final shopping and saying goodbye to the best friends i have managed to make over these 8 weeks! I love you girls and u better not forget about me :*( aw im gonig to cry!! haha i cant think about this.. it makes me really upset...! oh my..so im not sure what im doing this weekend.. well partying obviously.. but where is the main question... we got the most booze for this weekend.. its nuts! i think maybe allans tonight and the cove tomorrow night... maybe... i dont know... im gonig to the solarium like everyday this week... i need to use all of my minutes! umm.. im have nothing to say at all... im just thinking up shit off of the top of my head to talk about! haha... lastnight me and trish and ashley went to the mall and trish treated me to ice cream :) because i only have like $10 to last until next week when i get paid! i get paid and i leave like 2 days after! haha whats the good in that? ohh deaarr....well nothing else to say!! have a great weekend!! x0x

I seriously have nothing to say when i write in this anymore.... hah....lastnight i went to see princess diaries 2.. it was amazing...um thats about it? haha i come home in 7 days... holy shit times flying i cant believe it! I am extremely excited to see everyone! i cant get over the fact that i actually made it through 2 months ... i would have never thought i could do it!! no one thought i could go it... sad.... haha... whatever though... i have acomplished something...well i think so anyways...tomorrow is friday... again... then after this weekend i have no weekends left out here!! I cant wait till next year to come out here... oh my... nothing else to say... have a nice day xo

8 mother fucking days..... cant write long today.. my supervisor should be in very soon.... i have a tour this afternoon at some garden thing.... haha woo hoo....

guess who i saw lastnight?? lisa , bev and maegan!! i was so excited!! i brought lisa some cookies! haha oh myy! shes picking me up at the airport on the 21st! i cant wait to see everyone! im soo excited now...! im not to sure what we are doing this weekend... probably nothing ... its my last weekend here.. i better make the best of it and drink the booze we have! ohh my..i dont think anything interesting has happened at all... i skipped off work yesterday and went downtown and to the mall... haha i suck at gongi to work... not mucxh else new... only samantha got caught making out with another girl....... funnny fucking shit....! haha have a nice day! xoxoxox
I think the guy next to me maybe looking at porn... i cant see his screen but he is looking pretty excited.... Hahahahahahahaha!!

10 days.... im not really wanting to come home to such a messed up place where everyone is different now... scary shit.. i only left for 2 months and i bet i will go home and feel as if i dont know anyone... this sucks.... but guess what? the same shit happens out here... i will be the same no matter where you go... i was at a party friday night and ppl were saying shit about me about the weekend before and about that guy i met... his brother was saying shit that didnt even happen to like everyone... ugh... idiot.. and i realized that this guy that i did meet is a total asshole... im not even getting into it now... fuck... then we goes home and 2 of the girls are mad at eachother over a fucking guy they are never going see again...so that was a bit of stress but we all got over it...and saturday i went to the mall with kayla kelly and veitch... i bought the most stuff... that night we went to another party... i was pretty fun! yesterday i got a new mp3 player and picked up my pics... then went to the emergancy room with jess to get the beer bottle glass out of her foot.. and visited clinton... then home and to bed.... so my weekend was pretty interesting.. i didnt get into the details because i have a lot of work to do... and some shit is just better left unsaid...
Have A Nice Day...xox

So its friday.... again... i cant believe it!! after this weekend i only have 1 weekend left here!fucking nuts..! i am gonig to cry so much when i leave!! its like i want to leave but i dont!i dont know... im just weird...yesterday i went shopping with the granparents instead of going to work.... then i packed up this huge box for them to take back to lab city for me.... i cant fit everything into my suitcases! haha! Im really sure what im doing this weekend... hopefully something fun again... nothing will ever compare to last weekend ...ever...oh my... so yesterday i bought all of my school shit then i bought 2 new shirts for me and a new cd (yellowcard) its amazing! and then some shit for my sister.... its cute :) hahah!and im not sure what i wrote last but im not sure if i wrote about my swimming trip.... so a few of us drive up to portugal cove and swim in this nice pond but then on our way back up to the car i friggen wipes out and wrecks my leg on a rock... hahaha typical tasha thing to do... haha anyways i have a hole in my leg now... great... aand also like 2 nights ago samatha and lisa gets into this huge scrap in the bathroom.... it was fucking scary....! oh my... well im out now!! have a nice day xoxox

I have a key chain with this guy on it...... funny :) i love that happy bunny shit... its hilarious....
congratulations. you are the kiss my ass happy
bunny. You don't care about anyone or anything.
You must be so proud

which happy bunny are you?
brought to you by Quizilla

My weekend was amazing.... friday night we went to some blowout where i met the most amazing guy ever.... i cant get over how amazing he was... but then we lost eachother and didnt get to give eachother our #s like we planned :( i am so mad... im hoping i will see him and another party sometime... oh well... then the cops busted the place so trish practically carried me home while dev tended to lisa... hahah we were pretty drunk.... i was promised george street after i had a nap haha but i passed out cold.. then some guys walk in the next morning... which was only like a couple of hours after and they were like "hey theres 2 chicks out here"  hahaha so after that i woke lisa up and we walked back over to our place.... we were still drunk at this point... it was really funny.... we had these older women staying in our res all weekend so one of them was out in the lounge when me and lisa walked in at about 7:30 and we looked hauled.... hahaha she was staring the most... it was funny...then later that day we went out for lunch down at churchill square and then picked up some alcohol and went to my tanning session! after that we came home and got ready and trisha had this friend that picked us up and we stopped by the store got some more booze and then headed to taylors house where she was having ppl in... after getting really really drunk because we also had another trip to the liqour store with taylor...haha we then headed to george street... where i got in!! YES :) then we went to like 2 bars and dragged lisa home... i wont add in some of the details of that night though... i was a long long night.... we went back to res at about 5 that morning.... then we woke up and went grocery shopping.... $200 bucks gone between me trish and lisa..... we got alot of food!! then lastnight nicole stayed over and we rented "cofessions of a teenage drama queen" it was stupid... but the ending was pretty good! yup... then i talked to jamie for a bit and went to bed...this morning i got up at like 8:55.... and got ready as fast as i could and walked over to work...my supervisor just came in and shes taking me to lunch at 12! :) i come home in 18 days!! well i like to say 17 because im not counting my last day here.... and i have like 11 work days!! crazy! i cant fucking wait to come home.... :) well im out now... have a nice day!! xoxox

The \\
Last Cigarette:My second day out here....
Last Alcoholic Drink:last weekend
Last Car Ride:2 days ago
Last Kiss:before i left :*(
Last Good Cry:lastnight
Last Library Book:???
Last book bought:not sure!
Last Book Read:whatever one i read last in school!
Last Movie Seen in Theatres: i robot
Last Movie Rented:butterfly effect
Last Cuss Word Uttered:???
Last Beverage Drank:BOOST ( strawberry) haha
Last Food Consumed:some chips lastnight
Last Crush:NOT TELLING ;) hahahaha
Last Phone Call:lasnight
Last TV Show Watched:holy shit... a long time ago
Last Time Showered:yesterday
Last Shoes Worn:my flip flops that i have on now!
Last CD Played:Billy Talent
Last Item Bought:2 shirts at smart set!
Last Download:MSN this morning on my fresh computer! hah!
Last Annoyance:wont mention that...
Last Disappointment:about a week ago... i hate him now... :*(
Last Soda Drank:not sure!!
Last Thing Written: a message from a missed call for sam this morning
Last Key Used: the one to get into the building lastnight...
Last Words Spoken:"thanks" to the lady that lets me into this place to get on my computer
Last Sleep:lastnight
Last Ice Cream Eaten:at our slumber party last weekend...
Last Chair Sat In:the one im sitting in right now?
Last Webpage Visited:http://webct.mun.ca

CREATE YOUR OWN! - or - GET PAID TO TAKE SURVEYS!

This fucking computer broke again yesterday... i lost it...oh my.. So i watched Butterfly Effect lastnight... it was the best movie i have ever seen.. it was amazing... i am still in shock! haha!
TODAY IS FRIDAY!!! and im gonig to a blowout tonight.... it better be a fucking blowout anyways.. i wsa promised...i need to have fun or im coming home... i am SOO homesick lately... no one even understands... only lisa haha.. 21 days... cant fucking wait...my first day home i am making mom cook some real food then im gonig out and getting fucking loaded... and im staying loaded for 2 weeks straight...sounds good to me! when is the regatta again?? is it today? someone drive out here for fuck sakes and pick me up and bring me home... please?? I NEED HOME!!! :*( anyways.... enough of my whining
not sure what i am doing all weekend..mall probably... like everyday... this place is getting to me... we only go to the mall, movie or sit on our asses and watch movies... fuck !!!!!! well im out now... im sure u are all sick of my bitching...xo

I left work early yesterday because i had a Doctors appointment at 3:50. that didnt go so well... she cant figure out whats wrong either.. she suggests a light down in my throat to see whats gonig on.. :*( i dont want it done! and she gave me medication and then i went to pick it up and SURPRISE no insurance anymore... fucking ioc...  so i paid way too much for pills yesterday...oh my... yersterday i didnt do much at all... got home sick... watched a movie... then went to bed but slept in patricias room because mine was scary... hahaha then a wake up at 4:30 barfing my guts up.... seriously... there was nothing in me to throw up so it wasnt a cool experience... i told jody that this morning and she told me to go and call in sick but guess what? here i am! at work! i didnt want to miss much more work...im sick like everyday... maybe i will get to go home(to lab city) early because im not getting any better out here.... the homesickness might not be adding either! whatever... i would like to stick out the next few weeks though... just get them over with and say that i did it...I just want real food... my mom keeps asking me if im like a stick yet because i should be by what i eat... but the funny thing is i dont think i have lost a pound! well doesnt feel like it! ohhh my..... i wonder how things are at home!?! someone inform me! i think i am gonig to St Lawerence this weekend with taylor and lisa and pat... taylors driving us out in her new jeep i think! should be fun ! :) a good laugh anyways! Hey veitch u reading this?? call me and we will all go see a movie like some night this week!! well thats all for now... should go do some work i have a tour in 2 hours! :*( have a nice day ox

So I walk out of my building today (my temporary summer home) and guess who is jogging passed me?? Mark Payne?? That was weird... very weird and unexpected... haha! I was in complete shock...!seeing ppl i know takes me by surprise for some odd reason... especially when i just get up and walk out of my building and thats what i see! oh well! humm.. so i went home sick yesterday...  i ate a grilled cheese sandwich and pizza and thats all i really had all day... i feel yucky all the time... hah my food doesnt like to go down good. but oh well.. i was home all day yesterday and so was Gillian and we didnt even see eachother all day! haha! then i went over and paid my meal card and res that was $700 down the drain right there.... and i canceled my meal card... so hopfully i will be saving some money .. ohh dear... and lastnight we all sat around and told ghost stories and shit.. it was pretty cool... we dont usually all get together like that.. like including our supervisor.. it was awesome.. im now scared to go to sleep but thats fine! theres a lot of stories about places on res alone... yikes :*( haha im a wimp... but oh well! today im not sure what we are doing.. i think i might hang out with amanda.. not sure... got to call her... hopefully we wont end the night at the hospital again!  i am falling asleep! My hair is so hard to manage now... like it flicks off everywhere and wont be nice... ugh.... i think its because of like the humitity and shit too...yup.. well nothing else really to say! have a nice day xoxox

funny weekend.... friday night i hung out with amanda templeman , we went to the mall then back to res where I was throwing up and in lots of pain. so my mom called and i was in tears and she was mad that i didnt go to the hospital like she told me too earlier that day. so then she calls me godmother and then godmother calls me and tells me that campus patrol is coming to pick and up and is bringing me to the emergancy room.... jessica and amanda came... haha thanks guys :) and then my supervisor jody comes in about an hour later worried to death because i was in major emergancy and not minor! haha! she didnt even know iwas gone to the hospital until one of the other girls found out and told her.... so jody came and stayed with me until almost 5 that morning when they finally let me go.... and now im fucking bruised and poked full of holes... they put a fucking IV in me and then i moved so she had to try again on the other hand i was bawling my eyes out by then... i hate IVs more then anything..... then she comes in and takes my blood and shit... jesus... i have like gross bruises left from  it :*( anyways.. that was a fucked night... emergancy rooms are far more interesting out here... the things that happen amaze me... aright enough about that night... then saturday we went downtown... i bought a cute purse from balistics... and trish got her belly button pierced , that night we went to a BBQ and got loaded... it was nice.. but we brought particia home loaded and throwing up .... she passed out as soon as we like walked in...hah then later that night we had a slumber party.. nicole stayed over and we dyed mine and lisas hair... after dying my hair gillian decides she needs a smoke so i goes out with her in my pjs and my hair up in a towel... this was at like almost 4. one of the rugby men comes up and sits on the bench... he was like atleast 35 years old... he had a 10 year old daughter too! hahah so he had his arm around me and shit... creepy... but he was good looking for a old man.. hah! then his fellow team mates come over too... some of them only like 20 years old.. and they invite us up to their dorms... and then we see a few naked guys and we had a few laughs but i had to go to bed... i was dropping... hahah and picture what i looked like at that moment... towel and all... i took that off and stuck my hair up but still i was carrying it! haha so we all went home and me and nicole went to bed and after patricia woke up they went outside again and ended up there again! haha i slept through that fun time though.. hah :) And that was all for that night... on sunday after a very short sleep me and trish gets up and walks to the mall to get out hair cut ... yup... then we got our hair cut.. hhaha! so now my hair is dyed and cut! :) well im going to go do some work now! have a nice day xox
funny... that last update i just made i seriously have like 20000 mistakes.... whatever.... u all know what im trying to say.. im too tired to type...

I think im gonig to be sick....i was trowing up yesterday evening and lastnight... i think i have heat stroke of something.... im really sick right now too.... i might go home a bit early and sleep then at 1:30 i have to go to the engineering building for pictures then on a whale tour.... im really not in the mood to go anywhere.... a boat ride isnt going to do my stomach much good... yucky.... i feel like crap...my hair is driving me nuts... its curly today.. and annoying.. hah... i cant wait for tomorrow.. we are going downtown for some shopping.. i have to go and pay my shit for res and meals today... i got paid yesterday.... about $860! not bad! ahaha like all of its going towards staying here... and then the rest for school clothes :) i ahve to go grocery shopping too... not looking forward to that at all....fuck im so sick....i think im gonig to walk home now.. go back to bed.... have a nice weekend.. xoxo

Humm.. so things are crazy at home i hear? anyways... i need to talk to somone about the madness.. hah! I FINALLY got this friggen computer fixed... im super happy with it now... :) yay! haha i can finally do my work all over again... haha! i need someone to get online and tell me what time it is... my clock is messed on this computer and my cell phone is telling me a time that i dont think is right...i thought it was almost lunch! oh well... pam finally wrote in her journal.. im so proud.. haha i go to read it like everyday and theres never any updates... i guess no one is a loser like me and writes daily... haha or no one has a job like me actually! :) 
Lastnight me and patricia , lisa and nicole aka patricia went to a movie...! hahaha we went to see i robot... it was alright... a little weird.. but ok... i like the other movies i went to see more! i put a nice shirt on layaway lastnight in RIO, it was cute... so i get paid today and have to go pay for res and my meal card.. im getting that card cancelled its gay... i am just buying my own food now... yup ... so i am meeting the hot black guy that took my pic the other day... im getting introduced :) haha yay! cant wait... 29 DAYS TILL I COME HOME!!!!!!! oh my god i cant believe that tomorrow is friday... another weekend coming... its crazy... time is flying!!! corner brook girls come in today... woohoo... haha hope there not stupid ! haha nah they wont be... im nervous about getting my hair done on sunday.... very nervous... i need some sugestions! cut?? or just highlights?? i think i might get like bang things going over to the side... maybe... i dunno :*( ahh help! haha well i really need to do some work!! ill update tomorrow.. of course :) xox

Guess what? im on time for work...! crazy hey? now im waiting for my supervisor so i can bitch about all the work i lost yersterday on that god damn computer....
Lastnight me and patricia went to the mall and picked up our pictures and some cds... then after that we went outside and played basketball where a hot black guy asked me if he could take my picture! :) hahaha then after we met up with other black guys and one wants to meet me today after work... he was kinda creepy and besides i want his friend that took my pic earlier! haha im gonig to tell him that i have a boyfriend back home and he doesnt want me hanging out with other guys out here... good plan? i think so! so my pictures came out amazing... i love them.. :) oh dear... this afternoon i have a presentation in ferensics ( i have no idea how to spell that ) ..then i have to go down to churchill square pick up a new bank card and go the solarium...and then tonight we are hanging out with nicole veitch! ohhh my.... well im out now... have a nice day x

I went to the mall yesterday after work  with lisa jessica and patricia. after our shopping we went to see  A Cinderella Story.... i loved it..... it was SOO good! haha im a geek... im buying the sound track today.. the music in it is awesome.... i have to pick up my pictures today , make a solarium app and pick up a new bank card.. sorta lost mine lastnight at the mall... hah! the corner brook girls come in on thursday... they are staying in res with us.. we are having a big slumber party one night and the next night we have to take them to the mall or something! yup.. i think the weekend after that we are hitting george street.. im keeping my fingers crossed anyways! i have like a lot of solarium minutes left and only like 3 and a half weeks to use them! ohh my! i should be nice and dark! :) i bought a wicked shirt yesterday... its amazing... i saw a girl with it on like earlier that day and i freaked out i was gongi to go up and ask her where se got it.. then we were passing by Garage like an hour later and there it was... i ran in, tried it on and bought it! hahaha! yup... dont really think i bought anything else? cant remember ..ioc is on strike now so im gonig to be low on money for the rest of the summer.... fucking sucks! well i better get to work before the supervisor comes back.... oh yah i got busted... she knows i slept in like all of the past week! hahahaha oopsies! have a nice day!

oh my.... long day... today i never woke until 10:30 ! hahah i really suck ...um so the bus ride home yesterday was long... very long... we left at 3:30 and never got here until almost 10 lastnight...by the end of it me and lisa were really hyper and everyone on the bus i think wanted us dead or lisa atleast! haha.. today im gonig to wal mart after work to put in my pics from salmon fest.. they better come out... ill lose it if they dont...! I havent talked to lisa or jessica in like weeks.... they dont call back ever... so why should i call them? really though... lastnight pam called me when she was at andrews and she passed aorund the phone to everyone that was there... i was even talknig to lindy! yikes! haha.... then i was talknig to jamie about stuff.... i saw something at salmon fest that maybe wasnt that good of me to see... just caused problems... but oh well... he needed to know what was going on... im out here and he isnt so why not fill him in? oh my... what else happened?? oh yah me and jessica and lisa got into a HUGE water fight lastnight in the bathroom.... you should have saw the mess... it was SOOO funny.... we took hilarious pictures of us and the bathroom after.... we were in a state! funny .... when i was running out of the bathroom with the "shout" in my hand trying to escape i slipped and smacked down onto the floor and knocked the wind out of me! hahahahaha it ws some funny! i wish i saw it!! it was fun.... bobbi went home this weekend and shes not coming back... i cant believe it... 2 girls are gone home now... wonder whos next?? im homesick but i really think i can make it... 32 days left!! well my last week here wont even count im going to be so rushed and shit.. 4 weekends left.. thats actually nothing at all... time flys out here....i have already been out here for over 3 weeks... crazy... doesnt feel that long ! i still have an hour and a half left at work and im doing nothing because the 2 computers are pieces of crap and wont do shit all for me.....
i got my picture taken today.. some man came into the office and tood some pictures of my for wise...wow... see how exciting work is?? i miss mcdonalds.. hah! im going to go do some quizes!! have a nice day!

Right now i am at patricia's house in Botwood...we got here on friday night and then yesterday we got up and went to salmon fest at like 1 ! it was somewhat amazing... haha at first was having SO much fun... then everyone was being stupid and i couldnt handle trisha's friends anymore... they all got drunk and me and lisa didnt... u would think that it would be the other way around hey? but that was just about the gayest thing that happened... being around stupid drunk ppl when u are in a bad mood and arent drunk sucks.. i can't wait to come home.... cant wait at all... i want to go home right now.... everyone of the girls got to go home for atleast 1 weekend and me and lisa seriously are more homesick then any of them and we are the ones that live days away and cant go home for a weekend... i would paY like A million dollars to go home right now...fuck..
i got the worst sunburn yesterday... it hurts like a bitch... haha and guessw hat else? lastnight while waiting in line for the bathroom  i was bitching about how i have no way back to st johns and then some guy was like "im going to st johns tomorrow and you could come if u want" haha i was like ok and took his # but patricia and lisa would rather pay 60 dollars for a god damn bus ride that takes even longer because it has stops.... hah i would seriously go with him if they would too... he was nice... not bad looking... and only 20! haha! oh my... i feel like doing intersting for once... i hate being this bored all the time.. 
i lost count of how many days are left but thats all i know is its too many...well im out now... have a nice day because i know i wont... xox

15 down , 37 to go.... thats not bad at all....it really isnt... it feesl like i have been here for like 3 days not 15.. oh my... i just got to work like a half an hour a go...haha i slept in again... it was nice... i got up this morning and went for a jog at about 6:30 then i came home and went back to bed until 9:45.. haha i suck at getting up...now im waiting for my supervisor to come in and then im out again to go get my lunch a little early because we have a tour this afternoon so im actually doing like no work at all today... i leave not tomorrow but the next day to go to botwood...im a little excited, a little nervous... haha i really hate driving and its so far away... well it seems that way anyways... atleast im not taking a bus now... some guy is driving us in.. patricia knows him.. god im so sick... i might be hungry but i dont know... i felt like throwing up the whole time i was jogging this morning then when i went back to bed i felt extremely sick.. hope its not like the stomach flu or anything... thatd be shitty...just what i need is one more thing to make me want to go home... lovely.. i didnt do much yesterday i went to the solarium at 9 then when i got home i was in such a bad mood i didnt want to socialize with anyone or anything.. i was just homesick... my phone conversation earlier that day wasnt the greatest either... dont think we will be talking for awhile.. unless i see him somewhere when i get back ,then we will say hi or something...its just not fair.. it really isnt.. i hate the fact that things turned out like this... i guess i should have known.. well im out now.. hope todays better then yesterday.. 
bye xo

I miss you, Miss you so bad
I don't forget you, oh it's so sad

I hope you can hear me, I remember it clearly
The day you slipped away, was the day
I found it won't be the same

I didn't get around to kiss you, goodbye on the hand
I wish that I could see you again, I know that I can't

I hope you can hear me, Cause I remember it clearly
The day you slipped away, was the day
I found it won't be the same

Oh, I've had my wake up, won't you wake up?
